name: uuv-e2e-accessibility-test
description: Integrates the Unified UUV Testing Framework into Gemini to provide BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) assistance for your projects based on accessibility datas.

uuv-mcp-server.description: The Model Context Protocol (MCP) server exposing specialized UUV Tools (Gherkin file generation, etc.) to the Gemini Agent.
